title: Fix PDF highlights - PDFTextFinder returns wrong bounds
description:
attached_molecule: rff-wisp-1ek5
attached_at: 2026-01-25T16:47:24Z
dispatched_by: mayor

PDFTextFinder.findPattern() uses document.findString() which searches from document start. If the same text appears on an earlier page, it returns wrong bounds. Need to use page.selection(for: range) based on character positions from the regex match instead. This is why screenshot highlights work (use Vision coordinates directly) but PDF highlights don't.

title: Implement invoice schema learning system
description:
attached_molecule: rff-wisp-4cwv
attached_at: 2026-01-25T16:33:12Z
dispatched_by: mayor
